projectsCollection.title: Baglink - Product Cart
projectsCollection.description: A system I created to register and monitor the prices of products of user interest, making requests to an external scraping API for product information.

projectsCollection.altImage: Link preview API used in Baglink
projectsCollection.title: Link-Preview API Flask
projectsCollection.description: Used in my Baglink project, the link preview API scrapes the product page added to the cart to extract and return information such as price, image, and product description.

projectsCollection.title: Spotify Web Clone + Interactive Dashboard
projectsCollection.description: During the 4th semester of my degree, we created a project involving web development and Business Intelligence disciplines to build a Spotify clone with an interactive dashboard that displays user usage data.

projectsCollection.title: Spotify Android
projectsCollection.description: During the 5th semester, we were asked to redo the previous semester's project, but this time as a mobile app. We developed a reduced version using the SDK library and interactions with the Spotify Web API.

text.background: My name is Luiz Gustavo Obara, I am 22 years old and I graduated in Systems Analysis and Development from FACENS. From a young age, I have always been driven by a natural curiosity to understand how things work, which led me to pursue a career in technology.
text.experience: Recently, I worked as an Infrastructure Assistant and Frontend Developer at JPTI, where I was responsible for managing and maintaining servers, providing technical support, and developing internal systems such as a ticketing system and an e-commerce platform in the cosmetics sector. I also gained experience in network support and infrastructure at the Sorocaba City Hall, in addition to taking other opportunities that strengthened my IT skills.
text.present: I am currently looking for new opportunities, bringing with me practical experience in both development and infrastructure, along with my willingness to learn and embrace new challenges. My focus is on continuous improvement and creating innovative solutions to achieve the proposed goals.
